Name: Holiday Butcher Helmet
Description:
Item Type: Medium Armor
Damage Reduction: 30%

Celebrate the season with the festive Holiday Butcher helmet. Doomsday designed this twisted bit of armor to withstand a firefight, raucous holiday party, and everything in between. The snout's custom armor plating provides protection while remaining lightweight, and the synthetic spiral horns are more durable than the real deal. The Holiday Butcher adds to Doomsday's reputation as the universe's premiere engineer of warped gear.
